saying: Don't be afraid to show your fangs.
description: Wolfgang is a cranky, wolf villager who has appeared in every game from the Animal Crossing series. His name is derived from the famous composer, Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, and from his species. His Japanese name, Lobo, is Spanish for wolf; it also is the English name for another wolf. He appears on the album covers of K. K. Waltz and K.K. Adventure. His initial catchphrase refers to snarling, the sound a wolf makes when it is angry, fitting both his species and his personality.
